Text: Update on relocation processMorning Mr Lavorato I am emailing you to give you an update on the appraisal process Both appraisers went in to see the property on Friday June We are expecting one written report today and the other one tomorrow We should be in a position to give you your guarantee price by the middle of next week I was advise by Cendant Mobility that your spouses first name is Dina Please advise me if this is not the correct spelling of her name I will correct it in our system You can contact me by return email at oyallepagecom or by phone at or ext Since Im not totally sure at this point if your family has already vacated the property in Calgary so I dont want to send any documents there I am attaching three documents to this email so that you have them with you The first document is the offer information form and disclosure statement Since this document forms part of the guaranteed offer and would ask you to please complete this document and return it to me by fax by Monday June th My fax is The second document is a blank guarantee offer This document will be used in the event that you are able to negotiate a verbal agreement with a buyer prior to a guarantee price being established If this situation occurs please insert the agreed upon price and sign the RLRS Offer Return it by fax along with the Power of Attorney which forms part of this package Once these documents are received by RLRS we are in a legal position to sign an offer on your home showing RLRS as the vendor The last document is the amended sale program procedures This is the relocation program that has been approved by your company for your relocation It outlines in detail the procedures to be followed under that program It is a program that has been designed by the IRS and the US relocation council to deal with the issues of relocation and taxable benefits One thing that I want to you to remember is that if you have an offer on your property you must negotiate it verbally and please do not signed nor initial anything on the offer Once you have come to a verbal agreement with a purchaser Royal Lepage will sign that offer on your behalf You can contact me at the office between to or leave a voice mail message anytime I will be on vacation next week June th to June th If you need assistance during that week please contact Jessica Desouza at or you can use the and ask for ext Jessica will contact you next week with your guarantee price Could you also please email me your mailing address where to courier your guaranteed offer Do not hesitate to contact me should you have any questions Thank you Patricia Fournier Relocation Consultant Discfrmdoc Blkofferdoc raspprocdoc

Guarantee offerrepairsJohn I am sending out by courier today your guarantee offer Regarding the repairs that need to be done on your property I will coordinate them with you agent and the cost of the repairs will be deducted from your equity I will send you a copy of the bills once we receive them to let you know how much will be deducted Best regards Patricia
